channel.title: hugo on Phil's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in hugo on Phil's Blog

item.title: Hugo Cheatsheet
item.description: A test post to see if the new blog is working, also handy for checking out themes. You really want to look at the source for this page. Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Heading 4 Heading 5 Basic Formatting Hugo uses Github Flavoured Markdown. *This is italic* This is italic **this is bold** this is bold ***this is bold-italic*** this is bold-italic ~~this is strikethrough~~ this is strikethrough You can do a link like this: [link](https://github.
